Class Street

java.lang.Object
Street
All Implemented Interfaces:
StreetOperations
Direct Known Subclasses:
Building, Playground
public class Street extends Object implements StreetOperations
The class that includes the functions of all the operations that the Street can do Implements StreetOperations Interface and Override its methods ALL THE FUNCTIONS AND THEIR RESULTS ARE EXPLAINED AND COMMENTED IN "StreetOperations" INTERFACE.

    • addBuilding

      public void addBuilding(int paramBuildingtype, int paramSide, int paramPosStart, int paramLen, int paramHeight)
      Description copied from interface: StreetOperations
      Adds a building according to given parameters.(BuildingType=0 is House, BuildingType=1 is Office, BuildingType=2 is Market and BuildingType=3 is Playground). Side=0 is left and Side=1 is right.
      Specified by:
      addBuilding in interface StreetOperations

    • DeleteBuilding

      public void DeleteBuilding(int paramBuildingType, int paramListNumber)
      Description copied from interface: StreetOperations
      Deletes building according to given parameters which is related with List of Buildings. (BuildingType=0 is House, BuildingType=1 is Office, BuildingType=2 is Market and BuildingType=3 is Playground).
